$schema.$comment: This is ignored, but allowed, and is there to help your editor provide autocomplete and hints.
$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this configuration file.

allowOmitLanguage.$comment: If false, an error will be thrown while parsing the file.
allowOmitLanguage.description: Whether to allow fenced code blocks with no language specifier.

defaultLanguage.description: The default language to assume when reading a fenced code block with no language specifier.

eslintConfigPath.description: Optional path to eslint configuration file.

formatter.description: Third-party formatter to use when generating virtual source.

root.description: Whether the configuration loader should stop at the current directory (true) or continue up the directory path to find more configuration files (false).
